name: What's Up Dog?
description:
Disclaimer: This game is a two player game made for the Nintendo Switch which means that some features are missing in this version and the Controls are also not very great.

Movement:

Player 1: AD

Player 2: Left&Right

Dash: C

Swap characters once bar is full: U

Take part in an exciting and rigged race for food, switching between an agile cat and a clumsy dog. Annoy your friend by exploiting all the various items or try to survive the traps played upon you. But never forget your main goal: reach the praised bowl first and become victorious!
